    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  AbstractRForecaster
      Convenience class to implement an IForecaster with R.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.arima中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.arima中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ARIMA101Forecaster
      An R-based time series forecaster which computes a forecast based on exponential smoothing.
      class  ARIMAForecaster
      An R-based time series forecaster, auto-arima model selection.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.croston中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.croston中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CrostonForecaster
      Intermittent Demand Forecasting.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.cs中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.cs中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CSForecaster
      This is one of the forecasters used in the research paper on Self-adaptive workload classification and forecasting for proactive resource provisioning (http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/cpe.3224), authored by Herbst et al.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.ets中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.ets中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  ETSForecaster
      An R-based time series forecaster which computes a forecast based on exponential smoothing.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.mean中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.mean中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  MeanForecaster
      An R-based time series forecaster which computes a forecast based on the mean value of the historic values.
      class  MeanForecasterJava
      A Java-based time series forecaster which computes a forecast based on the mean value of the historic values.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.naive中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.naive中AbstractForecaster的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  NaiveForecaster
      This is one of the forecasters used in the research paper on Self-adaptive workload classification and forecasting for proactive resource provisioning (http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/cpe.3224), authored by Herbst et al.

    • kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.ses中AbstractForecaster的使用

      kieker.tools.opad.timeseries.forecast.ses中AbstractForecaster的子类

      class  SESRForecaster
      This is one of the forecasters used in the research paper on Self-adaptive workload classification and forecasting for proactive resource provisioning (http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/cpe.3224), authored by Herbst et al.
